p: We collected a set of proteins, identified in previous papers, relevant to both HIV–host and SARS-CoV-2–host interaction. We searched them using different protein and gene databases, including UniProt, KEGG, DisGeNet, and Integrity [ 36, 37, 38, 39]. Some examples of the most significant proteins that play a role in both HIV-1 and SARS-CoV-2 infections are presented in Table 1.
